thread.title: Xbox Play Anywhere FAQ: Everything you need to know
thread.title_full: Xbox Play Anywhere FAQ: Everything you need to know

author: Richard Devine
title: Xbox Play Anywhere FAQ: Everything you need to know
text:
Curious about just what Xbox Play Anywhere is all about? Let's explain.
Formally announced back at E3 2016 , Xbox Play Anywhere launched on September 12 with its first exclusive title, ReCore. The idea behind the feature is pretty straight forward, but there are a few details which need taking into consideration.
With that, let's try and break down and answer some of the key questions you may have.
